name: Jason And The Giant Beats
description:
Simon Hopkins

Nathan Keil

Mary Montgomery

"Jason and the Giant Beats"

BIO
Our game is a magical frog names jason and his journey across the treadmill.
On his journey he must use beats to defeat his bug enemies.
The enemy will play a beat, as shown on the beatpad in the upper right corner of the screen, and jason must copy the beat in order to defeat the enemy (and make a sick beat in the process!)

INSTRUCTIONS
to start the game press "s"
to spawn a new enemy press "n"

IMPORTANT!!

if you want to just hear the enemy play through the beats without having to respond (if the beats are getting too difficult), just press space! enemies will auto play their beats and you just can sit back and jam B^)

IMPORTANT!!
in a fight, the enemy will play a beat on the beatpad. this is shown by the buttons on the beatpad lighting up. in order to defeat the enemy, the user must hit the same buttons on the beatpad in the same rythm that the enemy played. the beatpad is described below:
_____________________________________
| 'q' | 'w' | 'e' |
_____________________________________
| 'a' | 's' | 'd' |
_____________________________________
| 'z' | 'x' | 'c' |
_____________________________________
with each letter being a button that is to be pressed when the beat is hit on the beatpad.
